fields.name: tracking_number
fields.title: Briefing Note Number
fields.description: This field will display the internal tracking number of the Briefing Note.

fields.name: title_en
fields.title: Title (English)
fields.description: This field is populated by the user with the official title of the Briefing Note, in English.

fields.name: originating_sector_en
fields.title: Originating Sector (English)
fields.description: The Sector, Branch, or Division where the Briefing Note originated in English. If there are multiple sectors/branches/divisions, they may be separated by a semicolon (;)

fields.name: addressee
fields.title: Addressee
fields.description: This field will display the person to whom the briefing note is addressed.

fields.name: date_received
fields.title: Date Received
fields.description: This field will display the date on which the Briefing Note was received in the addressee's office.

fields.name: action_required
fields.title: Action Required
fields.description: The Action Required is the purpose of the briefing note; For Information: If the item is being routed solely for the information of the addressee; For Approval/Signature: If the item is for approval or signature only of the addressee; For Decision: If the item requests the addressee make a decisive decision

fields.name: additional_information_en
fields.title: Additional Information (English)
fields.description: This field will display any additional information/comments for the Briefing Note, in English.
